metadata.synopsis: Party reaction after encountering another tadpoled character who mentions the Absolute.Speaker 1 is the character who left the dialog and draws attention to the connection between being tadpoled and hearing the voice of the absolute.Speaker 2 reacts to speaker 1.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Wait, True Souls are infected like us? Why do they think they're talking to a god?

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Seems we lucked out in keeping the Absolute's voice out of our heads.
